title: When Crystal Palace, Big Mal and Terry Venables were (briefly) the hottest team in football
text:
You can only assume that one of the high-ups at BT Sport is a Crystal Palace fan. Either that or the loved ones of a BT Sport high-up are currently being held against their will in a basement near Selhurst Park until all demands are met.

How else to explain a piece of programming this week called ‘Crystal Palace: Team of the Eighties’? On Wednesday, the broadcaster has finally given the public, or at least a small section of it around Croydon, what it wants. And that is a feature-length film about Crystal Palace FC back in the days when an exciting young team had their fans daring to dream of a side good enough to dominate English football in the decade to come.

It’s a joyful, fun and often enjoyably...
description: You can only assume that one of the high-ups at BT Sport is a Crystal Palace fan.
